CustomField.description: A count of all the working days making it easier to calculate the non working days in code. And saving script statements getting the count for each task. This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.formula: /*count of all the working days making it easier to calculate the non working days in code.*/ /*Is also for saving script statements getting the count for each task in code*/ IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Monday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Tuesday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Wednesday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Thursday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Friday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Saturday__c, 1, 0) + IF(project_cloud__IsWorking_Sunday__c, 1, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.label: Working Days in a Week
